2: List of Interstate Highways in Texas

--------------------
Text: List of Interstate Highways in Texas:  The Interstate Highway System in Texas covers 3239.7 mi and consists of twelve primary routes, seven auxiliary routes and Interstate 35 (I-35) which is split into two branches, I-35E and I-35W, that provide access to both Fort Worth and Dallas.
